newsitem.title: ITALY: Italian coastguards capture 60 illegal immigrants.
newsitem.headline: Italian coastguards capture 60 illegal immigrants.

text.p: Coastguards intercepted a Tunisian fishing boat carrying 60 illegal immigrants off the southernmost Italian island of Lampedusa, port authorities said on Wednesday.
The immigrants, who were picked up late on Tuesday night, were of different nationalities and would be repatriated as soon as possible, a statement said.

Illegal immigration from North Africa and Albania has become a growing problem for Italy in recent years. The statement said coastguards had caught 224 people trying to enter Italy illegally in August and September.
